title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Cascade Jhumka Earrings - A Timeless Tradition
materials: 22K Gold Base with White Rhodium Polish
features: Intricately designed Jhumka earrings with floral top featuring a vibrant emerald center. Cascading floral motifs lead to a bell-shaped jhumka dome, entirely encrusted with sparkling cubic zirconia in a pave setting. Finished with a delicate pearl drop for added elegance and a Hyderabadi polish that gives it a rich, lasting lustre.
description: A perfect blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary elegance. The Emerald & Diamond Floral Cascade Jhumka Earrings showcase meticulous craftsmanship, adding a touch of regality to any ensemble. The high-quality cubic zirconia provides a diamond-like brilliance at an accessible price point, ensuring you shine without compromising your budget. A timeless investment that can be cherished for generations.
